# How To Manage And Edit Time Cards

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/how-to-manage-and-edit-time-cards/

## Category
09 Staff And Payroll

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
STAFF MEMBERS
TIME CLOCK
Managing Time Cards
IN THIS ARTICLE
Adding time cards
Editing time cards
Deleting time cards

This article covers adding, editing, and deleting time cards. Editing time cards can be helpful if a staff member forgets to clock in or out.

To manage time cards, you must be an Admin user, or you must have the Can manage time cards permission enabled in Staff Member settings.

Link copied
Adding time cards

To add a time card, open the Time Clock app and select Manage Time Cards.

Select Add Time Card and enter the required information.

Link copied
Editing time cards

To edit a time card, select the time card and use the pencil icon to edit.

Link copied
Deleting time cards

To delete a time card, select the time card and select Delete from the "..." menu.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
